features.description: Initialize R project with renv, folder structure, and CLAUDE.md context file
acceptance: Initialize R project with renv, folder structure, and CLAUDE.md context file works as expected

features.description: Define and install required packages (survey, srvyr, robotoolbox, sf, gtsummary, etc.)
acceptance: Define and install required packages (survey, srvyr, robotoolbox, sf, gtsummary, etc.) works as expected

features.description: Connect to KoboToolbox API using robotoolbox package with authentication
acceptance: Connect to KoboToolbox API using robotoolbox package with authentication works as expected

features.description: Download survey submissions from KoboToolbox with select_multiple handling
acceptance: Download survey submissions from KoboToolbox with select_multiple handling works as expected

features.description: Merge survey versions A (without food waste) and B (with food waste) with proper NA handling
acceptance: Merge survey versions A (without food waste) and B (with food waste) with proper NA handling works as expected

features.description: Process select_multiple columns into binary indicators with proper labeling
acceptance: Process select_multiple columns into binary indicators with proper labeling works as expected

features.description: Classify missing data as structural (skip logic) vs non-response vs data error
acceptance: Classify missing data as structural (skip logic) vs non-response vs data error works as expected

metadata.projectGoal: Data Pipeline - Import KoboToolbox data, clean and process survey responses
